caturakkha：caturakkha（pu）
စတုရက္ခ（ပု）
[¿]
[¿]

Caturakkha：One of the dogs whom the goat Melamātā proposed to take with her on her visit to the jackal Pūtimamsa （J．iii．535）．

For details see the Pūtimamsa Jātaka．

In the Rgveda，Caturaksa is mentioned as one of Yama’s dogs．Jātaka transl．iii．318，n．1．

caturakkha：စတုရက္ခ（ပု）
[¿]
စတုရက္ခမည်သော မြေခွေး။
